artist: Artist: Per Gustav Floding; Artist: after François Boucher
creditline: Gift of the Print and Drawing Council
description: 4 figures:  1 on steps at top center, 3 clustered in foreground; flags, shields, swords and helmets in foreground; printed in brown
inscription:
Signature, Date and Inscription

LLC below image, in brown: [F. Boucher Invenit.]; below image, in brown: lengthy inscription with coat of arms at center; see also Signed
medium: Engraving, etching and aquatint (lavis) in bistre ink
provenance: [James A. Bergquist, Boston, until 1992; sold to MIA]
signed: LRC below image, in brown: [P. Floding Svecus Sculpsit Par. 1762]
title: Un Corps de Garde
